pages.title: Torment
pages.text: Torment is an alternate dimension, an endless void that only contains six vertically-stacked mazes. The mazes are independent from each other, and one can't reach one from another.

pages.title: Entering the Torment
pages.text: To initially enter the Torment dimension, a $(l:creatures/lord_of_torment)Lord of Torment$(/l) must be summoned and fought. When half of $(item)Lord of Torment$()'s health is depleted, it will teleport itself and the players who are fighting in this dimension.

pages.title: Entering the Torment
pages.text: A player that has advanced symbology skills and knowledge can also banish certain types of creatures, including other players, to the Torment with a $(l:symbology/symbol_list#tormentum)Spell$(/l).

pages.title: Exiting Torment
pages.text: At the end of each maze in the Torment there is a $(item)Torment Portal$(). The player has to solve the maze to reach the portal, which will teleport them back to the $(item)Overworld$()$(p)When a player dies in the Torment dimension, they will be teleported back to the Overworld.
